name_thai: วัดพระแก้ว
belief: Revered as the most sacred temple in Thailand, housing the Emerald Buddha.
Symbolizes the dawn and enlightenment in Buddhist teachings.
Famous for the reclining Buddha and traditional Thai massage teachings.
Home to the Golden Mount, symbolizing perseverance and devotion.

name_thai: วัดเบญจมบพิตร
belief: Known as the Marble Temple, representing elegance and serenity in Buddhism.

name_thai: วัดไตรมิตร
belief: Houses the world's largest solid gold Buddha statue.

name_thai: วัดร่องขุ่น
belief: A unique white temple symbolizing purity and enlightenment.

name_thai: วัดพระธาตุดอยสุเทพ
belief: A sacred site in Chiang Mai believed to house relics of the Buddha.

name_thai: วัดมหาธาตุ
belief: Features the famous Buddha head entwined in tree roots in Ayutthaya.
